content.text:
## Analysis of the Main Target Image

The target structure appears to be a simple vehicle or bulldozer-like construction with:

- Total blocks: 4 blocks
- Layers: 2 layers

Spatial relationships:
- Base layer: An orange cylindrical block with two circular ends (appears to be the main body/base with wheels)
- Top layer: A green rectangular block placed horizontally on top of the cylindrical base
- An orange triangular block positioned at the right end of the green block (resembling a blade or scoop)

## Selection of Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, the following blocks are needed:

1. Block with index 7: Orange horizontal cylinder (for the base/vehicle body)
2. Block with index 2: Green horizontal rectangular block (for the top platform)
3. Block with index 6: Orange horizontal cylinder (for the second wheel)
4. Block with index 14: Orange triangular block in right-facing orientation (for the scoop/blade)

## Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 7
   Step2: Move block with index 6
   Step3: Move block with index 2
   Step4: Move block with index 14
}
```

This assembly sequence first creates the wheeled base using the two orange cylindrical blocks (7 and 6), then places the green rectangular platform (2) on top, and finally adds the orange triangular blade (14) to complete the structure.
